name: MorrisseyAnukiBattle
_source: s;Morrissey;What are you thinking, foolish girl?!|Your place is at my side, not this upstarts!

s;Anuki;When you betrayed him, father, you betrayed me as well.|He has shown me respect and trust.{w} He's protected me on the battlefield,|just as I have protected him.{w} You have no right to raise your hand against him.
s;Morrissey;No right? No right?!{w} Oh, how I've failed to teach you!|We have every right to do as we please, Anuki.|For the victor, the strongest, there is nothing that they have no right to.
s;Anuki;Seems that you haven't realized that you aren't the strongest-|and haven't been for a while.
s;Morrissey;You seek to dethrone me? Hah!{w} Swing well, my daughter.|You won't have a second chance.
